text: I never stood a chance Three years since I last worked    wasted years in all  I should never have gone to university in the first place   In the last three years since a mental break  I ve done nothing but decline  I ve had multiple courses of medications  I ve had three full courses of  talking treatments   therapy  and it s all amounted to fuck all   Oh I ve learnt plenty over this time  I recovered my memory of childhood that I had long since lost  and found nothing but pain and sadness  turns out I ve struggled with depression since a young age   I m now    Emotional neglect by who I now see to be truly awful parents  resulted in weird sexual thoughts that went unchecked  Responsible for gender dysphoria for the last   years   Diagnosed very close to the autistic spectrum  just a year ago   In response to some of these newer bits of information  parents said I should just turn to god for all my troubles to go away  I m an atheist  gave up their warped ideals a long time ago  They refused to speak to me after that  that was two years ago   He ll turn to god when he s ready   No money left  One brother was kind enough to give me a place to live   Symptoms are as varied as my problems  Clear depression and anxiety  Some symptoms associated with the autism  The worst is the dissociation  it takes almost nothing for me to  zone out  to become unable to make rational choices  to become an observer to my own actions  watching but not recognising my own limbs at worst   Everyone is stumped  Friends watch helplessly while family doesn t care  Doctors just try what they can saying  never quite seen a case like yours before  before referring me  Last one said I d  reached the end of his skill set I don t know why I m still here  Maybe dissociation is preventing me from taking my own life leaving me in this hell  I have a psychiatric appointment in two weeks with someone new  but it s the last hope  I won t see the end of the year if things don t start to improve soon  I m just too tired to go on much longer   Thank you for reading
summary: In the last three years since a mental break, he's done nothing but decline. He's had multiple courses of medications and three full courses of talking treatments therapy. He was diagnosed with gender dysphoria and autistic spectrum disorder a year ago. He has a psychiatric appointment in two weeks.
cleaned: year mental break decline multiple course medication course talk treatment therapy diagnose gender dysphoria autistic spectrum disorder year ago psychiatric appointment week

text: Where to go from here I watch the people struggle with suicide  some struggling with depression over the long term  Others with situations to large for them to know how to cope  Mostly a lot of people giving up  maybe reaching out that one last time for validation in the hopes they won t have to go through with it  or if they do  it means something Sometimes i try to help  ask the while thinking I m just a liar  hoping that good deed will convince me not to take my own life  repeating arguments said to me  or imparting experiences I ve had hoping there s something in there that will remind me to keep going you a little while longer till the pain passes But mine doesn t really pass  not because there wasn t hope or things that could have helped  but because I ignored them when it mattered and now  with the combination of long term suffering and a painful situation i couldn t possibly begin to cope with  I don t have enough in me to drag myself out of this hole one more time Add in the grind of age  and it feels like it s time I m sorry to ask the people hurt by this  sorry to those I disappoint  sorry to those I can t help but making it through just one more day  Sorry to any future children i won t father  Sorry to the one unlucky enough to be one I did I failed  All of you I m sorry
summary: People struggle with depression and suicide. Some people reach out for help, others give up. I am sorry to the people hurt by this. I'm sorry to any future children I won't be a father. I failed them all.
